channel.title: Client Crashes/ stops working
channel.description:
Well I downloaded the client and when i run it, it loads barley anything then it crashes. i took a screenshot to see what was the last thing it did before it crashed and it lead me to the solution.
You lost connection while downloading a needed file. Please download it manually from: http://www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip and extract the file to your c:/windows/.mpr_file_store_32/ folder. Then restart MoparScape. Fatal error, exiting.
so, i think i need to download "http://www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip" but... when i go to the page, it doesnt exist. help?

item.title: Client Crashes/ stops working
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

I will help you.

uploading cache for u on rapidshare.
done.

http://rapidshare.com/files/49663960/.mpr_file_store_32.rar

extract file to your C:/windows/.mpr_file_store_32

Read full topic

item.description:
@Kypi wrote:

Well I downloaded the client and when i run it, it loads barley anything then it crashes.
i took a screenshot to see what was the last thing it did before it crashed and it lead me to the solution.

You lost connection while downloading a needed file. Please download it manually from: http://www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip and extract the file to your c:/windows/.mpr_file_store_32/ folder. Then restart MoparScape. Fatal error, exiting.
